dct_title_s: Map of the east flank of Baldy Mountain, Maxwell Grant, N. Mex
dct_description_sm: Reconnaissance 1897 ; O. St. John ; H. Hendrickson, Del.
Legend shows "Stadia Stations," "Compass-Stepped Stations," "Maxwell Mineral Survey Monument," prospects, tunnels, shafts.
Shows waterways, various locations (saddles, mills, summits, ditches, cabins, etc.), towns.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
